item.title: ON

item.title: PINS

item.title: RBLX
item.description: score:203 Chances: Roblox stock has cleared a buy point following a bullish Wall Street call. RBLX stock has been on a strong recent run, rising around 74%. Wells Fargo initiates coverage of the gaming platform Roblox (RBLX) with an ‘Overweight’ rating on the stock and a price target of $49 per share.

item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:73 Chances: TG Therapeutics stock saw a welcome improvement to its Relative Strength (RS) Rating, rising from 87 to 93. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.8%. The positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.

item.title: PATH
item.description: score:-81 Chances: UiPath shares have been gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions. The company’s stock led the NYSE and has beaten the market by a significant margin this year. Risks: There was a notable insider transaction where the General Counsel and Chief Legal Officer sold 105,000 shares of the company, which may raise concerns about insider confidence.
